list.name: FIRST-BASH
list.description: When hitting an opponent with his attack charges full, Ash gets even more angry. His Rage goes up by x%.
list.descriptionHtml: When hitting an opponent with his attack charges full, Ash gets even more angry. His Rage goes up by x%.

list.name: MAD-AS-HECK
list.description: Ash progressively gains up to x% faster reload speed, equal to how enraged he's become.
list.descriptionHtml: Ash progressively gains up to x% faster reload speed, equal to how enraged he's become.
